entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as lazily enjoying the sight of Harry standing motionless, eye to eye with the angry snake. He said 'Don't move, Potter' and claimed he would get rid of the snake.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Potter is mentioned as being motionless, eye to eye with the angry snake. Snape told him not to move.

entities.name: lockhart
entities.description: Lockhart shouted 'Allow me!' and brandished his wand at the snake, but instead of vanishing, it flew into the air and fell back to the floor.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as standing motionless, eye to eye with the angry snake. He wasn't sure what made him do it, but he shouted 'Leave him!' and miraculously, the snake slumped to the floor.

entities.name: justin finch-fletchley
entities.description: Justin Finch-Fletchley is mentioned as being in danger of being bitten by the snake. Harry shouted 'Leave him!' to save him.

entities.name: snake
entities.description: The snake is described as angry, hissing furiously, and poised to strike. It was raised itself again with fangs exposed before Harry shouted 'Leave him!'

relationships.description: Snape told Potter not to move.
Lockhart brandished his wand at the snake, but it didn't work as expected.
Harry shouted 'Leave him!' and miraculously, the snake slumped to the floor.
